languages.text: "Например... вот недавно он подарил мне чудесное тассерциевое колье — буквально накануне вашего прилета. Странно, не правда ли? Я же из низшего дворянства, куда мне... такую роскошь. И я стала замечать, что беседовать с ним мы стали чаще, и словно бы... проще. Иногда мне кажется, он знает меня лучше, чем я саму себя".

traits.locale_text: "Например... он подарил мне вот это чудесное сапфирионовое колье — буквально накануне вашего прилета. Я сразу его надела, мечтая порадовать господина, но за ужином он... отчего-то разъярился, начал все крушить, сорвал с меня цепочку — и ушел! Исчез! Пару солнц и лун я все гадала, что сделала не так. А потом... господин Руолдо вернулся — изможденный, будто не спал все эти ночи. Он протянул мне кулон... И велел носить не снимая — для услады его глаз".

languages.text: "Well... he gave me a lovely thassertium necklace just before you arrived. Strange, is it not? To bestow such a treasure on someone of the lower nobility... And I also noticed that we have been conversing more of late, and it's been... easier. Sometimes, I think he knows me better than I know myself."
languages.original_text: "Например... вот недавно он подарил мне чудесное тассерциевое колье — буквально накануне вашего прилета. Странно, не правда ли? Я же из низшего дворянства, куда мне... такую роскошь. И я стала замечать, что беседовать с ним мы стали чаще, и словно бы... проще. Иногда мне кажется, он знает меня лучше, чем я саму себя".

traits.locale_text: "Well... He gave me a lovely thassertium necklace just before you arrived. Strange, is it not? To bestow such a treasure on someone of the lower nobility... And I also noticed that we have been conversing more of late, and it's been... easier. Sometimes I think he knows me better than I know myself."

"Well... he gave me a lovely thassertium necklace just before you arrived. Strange, is it not? To bestow such a treasure on someone of the lower nobility... And I also noticed that we have been conversing more of late, and it's been... easier. Sometimes, I think he knows me better than I know myself."

"Well... He gave me this lovely sapphirion necklace just before you arrived. I put it on at once, dreaming of pleasing my lord, but at dinner he... he flew into a rage and started smashing things. He ripped off my necklace and stormed out! He vanished! For a couple of suns and moons, I wondered what I'd done wrong. And then, Lord Ruoldo returned, exhausted, as if he hadn't slept in days. He gave me back the necklace and told me to wear it for the pleasure of his eyes."

"Well... he gave me a lovely thassertium necklace just before you arrived. Strange, is it not? To bestow such a treasure on someone of the lower nobility... And I also noticed that we have been conversing more of late, and it's been... easier. Sometimes, I think he knows me better than I know myself."

"Well... he gave me a lovely thassertium necklace just before you arrived. Strange, is it not? To bestow such a treasure on someone of the lower nobility... And I also noticed that we have been conversing more of late, and it's been... easier. Sometimes, I think he knows me better than I know myself."

"Well... He gave me a lovely thassertium necklace just before you arrived. Strange, is it not? To bestow such a treasure on someone of the lower nobility... And I also noticed that we have been conversing more of late, and it's been... easier. Sometimes I think he knows me better than I know myself."

"Well... he gave me a lovely thassertium necklace just before you arrived. Strange, is it not? To bestow such a treasure on someone of the lower nobility... And I also noticed that we have been conversing more of late, and it's been... easier. Sometimes, I think he knows me better than I know myself."

languages.text: “这么说吧……就在您来这里不久之前，他送给了我一条漂亮的塔瑟拉水晶项链。这确实很古怪，是吧？如此贵重的礼物，却送给像我这样的低阶贵族……而且我还注意到，他最近找我聊天的次数变多了，而且我们也……更容易聊得来了。有时候，我感觉他甚至比我自己还要了解我。”
languages.original_text: "Well... he gave me a lovely thassertium necklace just before you arrived. Strange, is it not? To bestow such a treasure on someone of the lower nobility... And I also noticed that we have been conversing more of late, and it's been... easier. Sometimes, I think he knows me better than I know myself."

traits.locale_text: “这么说吧……就在您来这里不久之前，他送给了我一条漂亮的塔瑟拉水晶项链。这确实很古怪，是吧？如此贵重的礼物，却送给像我这样的低阶贵族……而且我还注意到，他最近找我聊天的次数变多了，而且我们也……更容易聊得来了。有时候，我感觉他甚至比我自己还要了解我。”

languages.text: «Bueno... me dio un bonito collar de thassertio justo antes de que llegase usted. Qué extraño, ¿no le parece? Regalar un tesoro semejante a alguien de la baja nobleza... También me he fijado en que últimamente conversamos más a menudo, y me ha parecido... más fácil. A veces tengo la impresión de que me conoce mejor que yo misma».
languages.original_text: "Well... he gave me a lovely thassertium necklace just before you arrived. Strange, is it not? To bestow such a treasure on someone of the lower nobility... And I also noticed that we have been conversing more of late, and it's been... easier. Sometimes, I think he knows me better than I know myself."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno... me dio un bonito collar de thassertio justo antes de que llegase usted. Qué extraño, ¿no le parece? Regalar un tesoro semejante a alguien de la baja nobleza... También me he fijado en que últimamente conversamos más a menudo, y me ha parecido... más fácil. A veces tengo la impresión de que me conoce mejor que yo misma».

languages.text: "Şey... Siz gelmeden hemen önce bana hoş bir tasertiyum kolye verdi. Garip değil mi? Böylesi bir hazineyi alt tabakadan bir soyluya bahşetmek... Ayrıca son zamanlarda daha fazla sohbet ettiğimizi fark ettim ve bunlar... Kolay sohbetlerdi. Bazen beni benden iyi tanıdığını düşünüyorum."
languages.original_text: "Well... he gave me a lovely thassertium necklace just before you arrived. Strange, is it not? To bestow such a treasure on someone of the lower nobility... And I also noticed that we have been conversing more of late, and it's been... easier. Sometimes, I think he knows me better than I know myself."

traits.locale_text: "Şey... Siz gelmeden hemen önce bana hoş bir tasertiyum kolye verdi. Garip değil mi? Böylesi bir hazineyi alt tabakadan bir soyluya bahşetmek... Ayrıca son zamanlarda daha fazla sohbet ettiğimizi fark ettim ve bunlar... Kolay sohbetlerdi. Bazen beni benden iyi tanıdığını düşünüyorum."

languages.text: 「えっと…あなたが到着する直前に、総督はタッセリウムの素晴らしいネックレスを私にお与えになりました。おかしいと思いませんか？低い階級の者にそのような貴重品を授けるなんて…それに、私たちが最近もっと、気軽に話していることにも気づきました。時々、総督が私のことを私以上に知っているように思うことがあります」
languages.original_text: "Well... he gave me a lovely thassertium necklace just before you arrived. Strange, is it not? To bestow such a treasure on someone of the lower nobility... And I also noticed that we have been conversing more of late, and it's been... easier. Sometimes, I think he knows me better than I know myself."

traits.locale_text: 「えっと…あなたが到着する直前に、総督はタッセリウムの素晴らしいネックレスを私にお与えになりました。おかしいと思いませんか？低い階級の者にそのような貴重品を授けるなんて…それに、私たちが最近もっと、気軽に話していることにも気づきました。時々、総督が私のことを私以上に知っているように思うことがあります」

languages.text: « Eh bien... Il m'a fait cadeau d'un collier en thassertium juste avant votre arrivée. N'est-ce pas étrange ? Offrir un tel trésor à une aristocrate de la noblesse inférieure... J'ai également remarqué qu'il discutait plus facilement avec moi ces derniers temps, et que c'est devenu plus... facile. Je me demande parfois s'il ne me connaît pas mieux que je ne me connais moi-même maintenant. »
languages.original_text: "Well... he gave me a lovely thassertium necklace just before you arrived. Strange, is it not? To bestow such a treasure on someone of the lower nobility... And I also noticed that we have been conversing more of late, and it's been... easier. Sometimes, I think he knows me better than I know myself."

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien... Il m'a fait cadeau d'un collier en thassertium juste avant votre arrivée. N'est-ce pas étrange ? Offrir un tel trésor à une aristocrate de la noblesse inférieure... J'ai également remarqué qu'il discutait plus facilement avec moi ces derniers temps, et que c'est devenu plus... facile. Je me demande parfois s'il ne me connaît pas mieux que je ne me connais moi-même maintenant. »

languages.text: "Ähm ... er hat mir kurz vor Eurer Ankunft eine bezaubernde Halskette aus Thassertim geschenkt. Seltsam, oder? Jemanden aus dem niederen Adel einen solchen Schatz zu schenken ... Außerdem ist mir aufgefallen, dass wir in letzter Zeit häufiger miteinander sprechen und es ... einfacher wird. Manchmal denke ich, er kennt mich besser als ich mich selbst kenne."
languages.original_text: "Well... he gave me a lovely thassertium necklace just before you arrived. Strange, is it not? To bestow such a treasure on someone of the lower nobility... And I also noticed that we have been conversing more of late, and it's been... easier. Sometimes, I think he knows me better than I know myself."

Außerdem ist mir aufgefallen, dass wir in letzter Zeit häufiger miteinander sprechen und es ... einfacher wird. Manchmal denke ich, er kennt mich besser als ich mich selbst kenne."
